product_name: Gaiam Sol OM Thirsty Yoga Towel
long_description: The Gaiam Sol OM Thirsty towel fits perfectly over your yoga mat to soak up sweat and ensure you have good grip during hot yoga, power yoga or vigorous vinyasa classes. Embossed polyester/nylon microfiber absorbs twice as much moisture as cotton and dries in half the time. Gaiam Sol OM Thirsty yoga towel measures 72 x 25 in.
short_description: The Gaiam Sol OM Thirsty towel fits perfectly over your yoga mat to soak up sweat and ensure you have good grip during hot yoga, power yoga or vigorous vinyasa classes.
